properties.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Coastal Willacy
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 3 at 4:29AM CST until February 3 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Inland Willacy, Inland Cameron, Coastal Willacy and
Coastal Cameron Counties.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor structural damage, such as metal
siding, will be possible due to these high winds. Unsecured
lightweight items, including remaining holiday decorations, will
blow away.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING
